item1.name: WILD FOREST JOURNEY
item1.desc: Hike through untouched forests, breathe the fresh air, and reconnect with nature's serenity.

item2.name: RIVER ESCAPE
item2.desc: Paddle along tranquil rivers, where every stroke brings you closer to nature's heartbeat.

item3.name: WATERFALL WANDER
item3.desc: Discover hidden waterfalls and embrace the beauty of sustainable exploration.

item4.name: ECO BIKE ADVENTURE
item4.desc: Cycle through rolling hills, leaving only footprints and taking only memories.

item5.name: STARLIT CAMPING
item5.desc: Camp under the stars in eco-friendly sites, where nature is your only host.

item6.name: COASTAL GREEN TRAIL
item6.desc: Explore coastal trails with minimal impact, preserving the ocean's beauty for generations.

item7.name: COMMUNITY ECO TOUR
item7.desc: Join local communities in sustainable travel, learning their ways to protect the earth.

secondSection.title: Explore Green Vietnam
secondSection.sub-title: Experience pristine nature, local culture, and a journey of sustainable travel.
secondSection.sub-title-img-1: Terraced rice fields merging with lush forests and friendly ethnic villages - an ideal retreat in unspoiled nature.
secondSection.sub-title-img-2: A vast wetland forest home to hundreds of rare bird species, immersing visitors in the rich ecosystem of the Mekong Delta.
secondSection.sub-title-img-3: Cool climate year-round, breathtaking mountain views, terraced fields, and scenic trekking trails in Northwest Vietnam.
secondSection.sub-title-img-4: Vietnam's first national park, known for its untouched rainforest, rare wildlife, and captivating eco-tours through diverse ecosystems.

thirdSection.title: Reason For Choosing Us
thirdSection.first-frame-sub-title: We're trusted worldwide by 20 million travellers just like you.
thirdSection.second-frame-sub-title: We're here for you. Reach out anytime by phone, email, or chat.
thirdSection.third-frame-sub-title: Your search ends here. We've got your entire trip covered!

fourthSection.title: Experience Green Travel in Vietnam
fourthSection.desc: Whether you're looking to unwind in nature, join outdoor activities, or explore local culture - green travel in Vietnam offers a journey that is both meaningful and memorable. From forest-edge eco-resorts to eco-friendly homestays, your adventure will always stay in harmony with nature and the community.
fourthSection.iframe-1-desc: A peaceful retreat nestled in the great highlands
fourthSection.iframe-2-desc: Explore, grow, and live green every day

fifthSection.title: Our Tour Blog
fifthSection.desc-1: Experience rural life in Vietnam by joining locals in tea harvesting. Immerse yourself in majestic nature and the peaceful rhythm of the highlands.
fifthSection.desc-2: Stroll through the charming ancient town, enjoy shimmering lanterns, and explore the traditional culture of Hoi An - a UNESCO World Heritage site.
